name: VR Cursed Night
description:
Prepare yourself for an unforgettable horror and suspense experience. VR Cursed Night leads you to the edge of horror and despair. We prepared a unique experience full of monsters and traps in darkest environments. Solve the entertaining puzzles, explore mysterious places and avoid the dangers hidden in the shadows. Never forget! You are not alone!

You can play the game in VR Cardboard or in Normal mode. The application is totally free.

FEATURES
- VR Cardboard or Normal Mode support
- Thrilling horror experience
- Realistic horror environment
- Hard and different game levels
- Zorlu bulmacalar
- Different monsters and creatures
- Different horror effects and animations
- 3D realistic sound effects
- Bluetooth gamepad controller support
- Easy, Medium, Hard Levels

HOW TO PLAY
- Automatic Mode: You move & fire where you stare by using your cardboard
- Bluetooth gamepad controller: Play with the gamepad controller
- Cardboard Magnet sensor: You can start/stop moving
- Manual Mode: You can play the game by using the virtual joystick and buttons on the screen, without changing your place. Additionally, you can see the around in 360 degrees.

Note: We strongly recommend that you play VR Cursed Night by gamepad and headphones in a dark environment. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
